result.reason: Current implementation forces remote desktop scaling to match local DPI; users need a manual override (e.g. 100%, 125%, 150%) to control remote text/element size independently.
result.approach: Add a `DesktopScaleFactor` property (e.g. Auto, 100, 125, 150, 200) to `ConnectionInfo`. Update `RdpProtocol.SetResolution` to use this value for the RDP `DesktopScaleFactor` extended property, falling back to local DPI only if set to Auto.
